main event: A resident observed two bright red flying objects over Miami, Florida on July 15, 1952.
interesting points: The witness reported that the objects hovered for several minutes before darting out of sight at a high speed., The first object moved to a different position in the sky before the second appeared., The witness is experienced in observing aircraft and is convinced the objects were not meteors or aircraft., The sighting occurred around 10:15 pm., The report is a handwritten document dated October 29, 1952.
witness description: Mrs. [redacted], a resident near the airport, accustomed to observing aircraft
